BUTTERFLY: ^Hey! You keep killing my fish brothers and sisters! Do you have any idea how hard it i to survive right now?
^The babies and babies and babies and babies are dying and at the rate we’re trying to protect them, our poison sacs are running out!
^What do you have to say for yourself!
MINIATUREEL: ^I know you are, I see you. You’re literally right there.
^Okay, well if you’re just kelp then you won’t mind if I have some salad.
^Huh? Wait no hold on, where are you? I can’t see you-
CORALLUMP: ^Whoa, is that popcorn on your head?
^You fool! It’s mean to be coral! I am a master of disguise and deception, and you mock me with this name of popcorn? Do you seek death!
^Well, you’re not that good at being coral if your head is glowing.
^That! That’s for hunting! And it works great, excuse you!
^I wonder if it also tastes like popcorn…
MAGMADISK: ^Why do you approach me, does my heat not fend you off? Have you grown so far in your hubris that you might ignore the heat of my brows, seeking to burn you away from me?
^I could eat a horse right about now

^Do you think I give off a visage of what you call a “horse?” I am an old creature of fate, one of fiery death and the peace that greets you in death. Your mockery of my kind will give you no peace, only unease in death.
^I think you look like a horse
REEFLOW: ^You, little one, come closer so I may see you. You do not belong here, I see it in your eyes. Ever gazing, ever turning.
^Oh, yeah, I got flung out of a cannon
^I see into your eyes of stars, I see what you desire. It is an infinite reach… come closer… I see… I see…
UNDERJAW: ^Oh man, you need to see a dentist
SCALLOP: ^What the scallop! You’re not a scallop!
^That’s- no, yeah, that’s what I just-
ECHOMEER: ^They’re gone… and you’re not going to stop, are you?
^All I want is to swim and be free, to see my children grow and spread. We are a small breed, and yet you draw us out and kill us… Have you no heart?
^Then what, what can you possibly have a heart for?
